sections.general:
INDEPENDENT BEAUTY ADVISOR
Career Overview
To gain an entry-level position in the customer service industry with room for growth and advancement that will lead to a lasting relationship.
Core Strengths
Customer service expert Top sales performer
Energetic work attitude Telecommunication skills
Courteous demeanor Adaptive team player
Sharp problem solver Strong organizational skills
